channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] FalconStor StorSafe for Power On-Premises (falconstor-software-storsafe-vtl-for-power) has changed the description of the plan named falconstor-software-storsafe-vtl-on-premise-enterprise
item.description: *before*: Pricing is based on the amount of the repository capacity in terabytes with a monthly billing. The subscription commitment is for a full year with automatic renewal. If the service is deleted, the remaining months of the annual commitment will be billed as a lump sum in the next billing cycle., *after*: Pricing is based on the amount of the repository capacity in terabytes with a monthly billing. If tapes are exported to object storage, additional capacity equal to 10% of the exported data must be ordered and will be added to the bill. The subscription commitment is for a full year with automatic renewal. If the service is deleted, the remaining months of the annual commitment will be billed as a lump sum in the next billing cycle.
